Class InventoryManager

java.lang.Object
com.dungeonGame.logic.InventoryManager
public class InventoryManager extends Object
Manages the player's inventory, including adding, removing, and using items.

This class also includes methods for random item generation and relic-specific logic.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    InventoryManager.RelicManager
    An inner class that handles logic related to the Relic, a unique item in the game.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(PlayerDataHolder player, String itemName)
      Adds an item to the player's inventory if it is not already present.
      Parameters:
      player - the player's data, including inventory
      itemName - the name of the item to add

    • hasItem

      public boolean hasItem(PlayerDataHolder player, String itemName)
      Checks if the player's inventory contains a specific item.
      Parameters:
      player - the player's data, including inventory
      itemName - the name of the item to check
      Returns:
      true if the item exists in the inventory, false otherwise

    • useItem

      public boolean useItem(PlayerDataHolder player, String itemName)
      Removes a specific item from the player's inventory if it exists.
      Parameters:
      player - the player's data, including inventory
      itemName - the name of the item to remove
      Returns:
      true if the item was removed, false otherwise

    • clearInventory

      public void clearInventory(PlayerDataHolder player)
      Clears all items from the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      player - the player's data, including inventory

    • giveRandomItems

      public void giveRandomItems(PlayerDataHolder player, int amount)
      Generates and adds a specified number of random non-potion items to the player's inventory.

      This method uses a default Random instance to generate items.

      • giveRandomItems(PlayerDataHolder, int, Random)
      Parameters:
      player - the player's data, including inventory
      amount - the number of random items to generate

    • giveRandomItems

      public void giveRandomItems(PlayerDataHolder player, int amount, Random random)
      Generates and adds a specified number of random non-potion items to the player's inventory. A custom Random instance can be provided for testing or customization.

      Internal Method Calls:

      • addItem(PlayerDataHolder, String)
      • hasItem(PlayerDataHolder, String)
      • GameUtils.delayPrint(String)
      Parameters:
      player - the player's data, including inventory
      amount - the number of random items to generate
      random - the Random instance to use for item generation

    • handleInventoryItemUse

      public void handleInventoryItemUse(String selectedItem, PlayerDataHolder player, PositionDataHolder pm)
      Handles the usage of specific inventory items and applies their effects.
      • Supported Items:
        • "Teleportation Spell" - Teleports the player to a random location.
        • "Cake" - Restores 3 power points.
        • "Sandwich" - Restores 5 power points.
      Internal Method Calls:
      • useItem(PlayerDataHolder, String)
      • TeleportationActions.useTeleportationSpell(PositionDataHolder)
      • PowerPointManager.addPowerPoints(PlayerDataHolder, int)
      Parameters:
      selectedItem - the name of the item to use
      player - the player's data, including inventory
      pm - the player's position manager
